body: I would also like to know this, from what I can see this either isn't supported by lottie yet or isn't documented anywhere.
@est7 @zackpollard Lottie doesn't yet support images but I've gotten a few requests for it so I'll look in to supporting it in future versions.
That would be great, this is a great library for animations, and would be great if it supported animations using static content that can't be vectorised too :)

rename.from: if AE exports json has some image assets reference,how to use it?

body: I am looking forward to it.

issue.title: Anti alias and filter image assets

repository.name: lottie-android

issue.title: ConcurrentModificationException

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

issue.body:
I have two animations playing in concurrently in a viewpager. Each animation contains images. Using via xml only. When my app exits I get the following crash:

Process: com.medicomip.eagle2, PID: 4287
                  java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
                      at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(HashMap.java:851)
                      at java.util.HashMap$KeyIterator.next(HashMap.java:885)
                      at com.airbnb.lottie.ImageAssetBitmapManager.recycleBitmaps(ImageAssetBitmapManager.java:68)
                      at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.recycleBitmaps(LottieDrawable.java:114)
                      at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.recycleBitmaps(LottieAnimationView.java:170)
                      at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.onDetachedFromWindow(LottieAnimationView.java:161)
                      at android.view.View.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(View.java:15446)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewGroup.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewGroup.java:3216)
                      at android.view.ViewRootImpl.dispatchDetachedFromWindow(ViewRootImpl.java:3255)
                      at android.view.ViewRootImpl.doDie(ViewRootImpl.java:5881)
                      at android.view.ViewRootImpl.die(ViewRootImpl.java:5858)
                      at android.view.WindowManagerGlobal.removeViewLocked(WindowManagerGlobal.java:446)
                      at android.view.WindowManagerGlobal.removeView(WindowManagerGlobal.java:384)
                      at android.view.WindowManagerImpl.removeViewImmediate(WindowManagerImpl.java:124)
                      at android.app.ActivityThread.handleDestroyActivity(ActivityThread.java:4207)
                      at android.app.ActivityThread.-wrap6(ActivityThread.java)
                      at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:1521)
                      at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:102)
                      at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:154)
                      at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:6077)
                      at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
                      at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(ZygoteInit.java:865)
                      at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:755)

Any suggestions?

Best regards Christian

body:
hi,man,here is the image animation file which worked wrong. you can get all the files you need just change the postfix to .zip and upzip it.
[eyesafe.txt](https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/files/795939/eyesafe.txt)

@MrGatsby2 I figured out the issue. It was what I suspected.
For this particular animation, I highly suggest making your image with shapes in after effects. The file will be smaller and will scale to any size with no artifacts if you do that and it'll use much less memory.
